DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To examine efficacy structured multidisciplinary intervention compare standard medical care improve subject 's QOL measure Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy-General global summary score ( FACT-G ) 4 week ( end intervention ) , 27 week 52 week . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To examine effect structure multidisciplinary intervention compare standard medical care improve subject 's psychosocial functioning measure 11 Linear Analogue Self Assessment ( LASA ) QOL scale , Profile Mood States ( POMS ) , Functional Assessment Chronic Illness Therapy-Spiritual well-being scale ( FACIT-SP ) , Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index , Epworth Sleepiness Scale , Control Preferences Scale , Exercise Behaviors 4 week ( end intervention ) , 27 week 52 week . II . To examine effect structure multidisciplinary intervention compare standard medical care improve caregiver 's QOL measure Caregiver QOL-Cancer scale , psychosocial functioning measure 11 LASA QOL scale POMS 4 , 27 52 week . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 group . GROUP A : Patients receive six 90-minute session multidisciplinary structure intervention comprise physical therapy , education , cognitive-behavioral intervention , discussion support , spiritual reflection , relaxation exercise 2-4 week . Caregivers invite session 1 , 3 , 4 , 6 . Patients may also receive brief telephone contact 6 month follow-up period . GROUP B : Patients receive standard medical care . Patients may also receive brief telephone contact 6 month follow-up period . After completion study treatment , patient follow 4 week ( end intervention ) , 27 week , 52 week .
